DOC.brief_summary: To validate German version Young Spine Questionnaire ( G-YSQ ) study back neck pain adolescent 10 16 year one year mean G-YSQ .
DOC.detailed_description: In two setting ( school , clinic ) back neck pain 10 16 year old adolescent assessed German Version Young Spine Questionnaire 6 point time one year . Validity , reliability responsiveness G-YSQ determine development back neck pain within year describe .
